DOC.brief_title: We Experience : Perspectives Quality Abortion Care Experience : A Patient Centered Approach
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine aspects abortion care important patient create `` high quality '' abortion experience , investigate patient ' expectation abortion care , explore provider perception patient ' abortion experience assess concordance patient ' perspective . The investigator conduct semi-structured interview patient participant provider separately determine patient ' expectation abortion care well important aspect abortion experience explore provider ' perception patient ' abortion experience ass concordance .
DOC.criteria: Women present Center Reproductive Health ( CRH ) induce abortion undesired pregnancy first trimester < 14 week . Women age 1845 year . Woman must complete surgical abortion procedure Women must able speak English Spanish . Women unable unwilling consent study unable unwilling complete followup interview Women unable consent and/or cognitively impaired . Women age 18 Women incarcerate .
